Imagery Description: (a) Bearded silen with phiale in right hand and fawnNon Sepcifiedskin over left arm standing in front of halfNon Sepcifieddraped Dionysos, seated upon a stele, with a phiale in his right hand. (b) Dionysos, with thyrsus in left hand and drapery over left shoulder, facing bearded silen, who bends forward holding out a phiale of eggs.
